markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Irriseni Ice-Witch](/Feats.aspx?ID=957) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Jadwiga ethnicity; [Wintertouched Human](/Heritages.aspx?ID=30) heritage

</column>

---

You can trace your direct descent from one of the Queens of Irrisen and thus from Baba Yaga herself. Your resistance to cold increases to 5 + half your level, and you can cast 5th-level [_wall of ice_](/Spells.aspx?ID=364) as an innate arcane spell once per day.
name: Irriseni Ice-Witch
